Function headers: getting HW MAC from device.

Function Documentation

portCHAR mac_get ( sockaddr_t *  address  ) 

Get the unique device ID.

Parameters:
address Device ID information in the address field on pdTRUE
Returns:
pdTRUE or pdFALSE (no storage/not found/corrupted)

portCHAR mac_read ( sockaddr_t *  sa  ) 

Read device ID from the debug interface. Requires the DEBUG preprocessor flag.

Parameters:
sa Device ID information in the address field on pdTRUE
Returns:
pdTRUE or pdFALSE (invalid format/cancelled)

Parameters:
address Device ID information in the address field
Returns:
pdTRUE or pdFALSE (no storage/not editable)
